profile:
The Sunburst Advantage is Our Dedication

At Sunburst Shutters & Closets, we offer products, services, and philosophies that make us a leader in the home design industry. As we continue to deliver exceptional services, we are proud to announce that we have partnered with  Sonata Design, a leader in the industry of window fashions, home automation and interior finishes. 

With our signature Polywood shutters and a vast selection of closet collections, paired with Sonata's patented Symphony collection, we bring life to homes with a design that looks toward longevity, performance, and aesthetics. 

Sunburst Shutters & Closets and Sonata Design provides the full breadth of home design options to help you achieve your vision

profile:
Closet Craft is a group of highly experienced individuals who take pride in delivering premium quality products that fit your storage needs and budget. With over 25 years experience in the closet organizer business, we are able to design any style of closet organizer, cabinet, or storage solution and transform your closet. We will create an organized space with the sole purpose of increasing your usable closet area with purpose and functionality.

Closet Craft has served the interior design industry, custom home builders and professional renovators of premium quality homes since 1994. Youâ€™ll find Closet Craft products installed in the most distinguished of homes in the Lower Mainland, including Vancouver, Burnaby, New Westminster, Surrey, Delta, Richmond, Tsawwassen, Cloverdale, Langley, Abbotsford, White Rock and everywhere in between, at an affordable price that will compliment your budget and your project.

Like most small businesses, we are locally owned and a family-run business. Our entire staff at Closet Craft have been working together for almost three decades as a family serving our customers with pride, care and outstanding service.

These qualities are what set Closet Craft apart.


THE CLOSET CRAFT PROCESS
CONSULTATION

We will meet with you in your home to discuss the best possible design solutions for the areas you would like to organize.

DESIGN

Based on the consultation, we will design your closet or storage units specific to your needs that are functional and efficient. A copy of drawings are presented to you for your approval.

ESTIMATION

Based on the design of the project and your budget, we will provide and estimated cost to you that is competitive and affordable. We'll work with you so you're happy with your quote.

INSTALLATION

Once the design and estimate are approved, we will schedule the production and installation of your organizers. Our professional and experienced installers take great care to insure proper fit and finish of your organizers.

AFTER SALES SUPPORT

Once installation has been completed, we are able to provide any additional services or extra shelving that you may want to add to your organizers.
